args: import json, pathlib, subprocess; repo = pathlib.Path.cwd(); src = repo / 'tests/fixtures/primitive_host/main.fzy'; cmd = ['cargo', 'run', '-q', '-p', 'fz', '--', 'run', str(src), '--host-backends', '--json']; proc = subprocess.run(cmd, cwd=str(repo), capture_output=True, text=True, check=True); payload = json.loads(proc.stdout.strip()); assert payload.get('exitCode') == 27, payload; print('primitive-host-operators-ok')

import json, pathlib, subprocess; repo = pathlib.Path.cwd(); src = repo / 'tests/fixtures/primitive_host/main.fzy'; cmd = ['cargo', 'run', '-q', '-p', 'fz', '--', 'run', str(src), '--host-backends', '--json']; proc = subprocess.run(cmd, cwd=str(repo), capture_output=True, text=True, check=True); payload = json.loads(proc.stdout.strip()); assert payload.get('exitCode') == 27, payload; print('primitive-host-operators-ok')
